comment: Galat Sanatan ped, suraj ya bhraman ki puja nahi karta. Sanatan ka srod OM se hai jaha se teeno mahadevo ki shakti prapt hai, Brahma, Vishnu, Shiv. OM ka koi roop nahi sarv shaktishali purn roop se atmanirbhar.

      :snt4 (a4 / and

            :op2 f7

      :op3 (f8 / fuck-01

comment: Sanatan me to murti puja bhi nahi hai. Ye hamari kamzori hai k hamne Vedo ko apne samaaj me na thik se samajhaya na padhaya.
amr:
# ::snt Sanatan me to murti puja bhi nahi hai. Ye hamari kamzori hai k hamne Vedo ko apne samaaj me na thik se samajhaya na padhaya.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (o / obligate-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Sanatan"))
                  :ARG2 (m2 / murti-
                        :ARG1-of (m3 / mean-01
                              :ARG2 (n2 / nahi
                                    :mode expressive))))
            :ARG2 p)
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (h / hamari
                  :mod (k / kamzori))
            :op2 (h2 / hamne
                  :mod (p2 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Vedo")))
            :op3 (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h3 / have-rel-role-91
                        :ARG1 (y / you)
                        :ARG2 (s2 / sister)))
            :op4 n2
            :mode expressive)
      :op5 (a2 / apne
            :mod (s3 / samaaj
                  :mod (p4 / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Vedo")))
            :ARG1-of m3
            :ARG2 (p5 / person
                  :ARG0-of (f / fuck-01)))
      :snt3 a
      :op1 (t / thik
            :mod (s4 / samajhaya)
            :mod-of s4)
      :op2 s4
      :mod (p6 / padhaya))
